description:
• Please do not apply unless you have fashion and e-commerce sales experience.*

Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced E-commerce Specialist to join our team. As an E-commerce Specialist, you will be responsible for managing and optimizing our online sales channels, driving revenue growth, and enhancing the overall customer experience. If you have a passion for e-commerce and a strong background in account management and technical sales, we want to hear from you. Duties: - Manage and optimize our e-commerce platforms, including website, marketplace accounts, and social media channels - Develop and implement strategies to drive traffic, increase conversion rates, and maximize sales - Conduct market research to identify new opportunities and stay up-to-date with industry trends - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration between online and offline sales channels - Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide regular reports on sales performance, customer behavior, and website analytics - Respond to customer inquiries and provide exceptional customer service - Stay informed about the latest e-commerce technologies and tools to continuously improve our online presence Qualifications: - Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field - Proven experience in e-commerce account management and technical sales - Strong negotiation skills with the ability to build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders - Excellent written and verbal communication skills - Proficiency in Spanish is a plus - Knowledge of customer service principles and practices - Familiarity with technology sales and outside sales techniques - Ability to analyze data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions Benefits: - Competitive salary based on experience - Health insurance coverage - Retirement savings plan - Paid time off If you are a motivated individual with a passion for e-commerce and a drive for success, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Please submit your resume along with a cover letter detailing your relevant experience. Only qualified candidates will be contacted for an interview.```
